effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

short_effect.black_white: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user electrifies itself, then charges. It causes considerable damage to the user and may leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user electrifies itself, then charges. It causes considerable damage to the user and may leave the target with paralysis.
